column1: {'{Description': {'{Id': '20250AB__024799INT', '{VersionNum': '99', '{History': {'{Action': {'{ActionText': 'INTRODUCED', '{ActionDate': '2025-01-15'}}, '{LegislativeInfo': {'{SessionYear': '2025', '{SessionNum': '0', '{MeasureType': 'AB', '{MeasureNum': '247', '{MeasureState': 'INT'}, '{AuthorText': 'Introduced by Assembly Member Bryan', '{Authors': {'{Legislator': {'{Contribution': 'LEAD_AUTHOR', '{House': 'ASSEMBLY', '{Name': 'Bryan'}}, '{Title': 'An act to amend Section 4019.2 of the Penal Code, relating to inmate firefighters.', '{RelatingClause': 'inmate firefighters', '{GeneralSubject': {'{Subject': 'Inmate firefighters: wages.'}, '{DigestText': {'{http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}p': 'This bill would require the above-described inmate firefighters, in addition to receiving credits, to be paid an hourly wage equal to the lowest nonincarcerated firefighter in the state for the time that they are actively\n\t\tfighting a fire.'}, '{DigestKey': {'{VoteRequired': 'MAJORITY', '{Appropriation': 'NO', '{FiscalCommittee': 'YES', '{LocalProgram': 'NO'}, '{MeasureIndicators': {'{ImmediateEffect': 'NO', '{ImmediateEffectFlags': {'{Urgency': 'NO', '{TaxLevy': 'NO', '{Election': 'NO', '{UsualCurrentExpenses': 'NO', '{BudgetBill': 'NO', '{Prop25TrailerBill': 'NO'}}}, '{Bill': {'{Preamble': 'The people of the State of California do enact as follows:', '{BillSection': {'{Num': 'SECTION 1.', '{ActionLine': {'{DocName': 'Penal Code'}, '{Fragment': {'{LawSection': {'{Num': '4019.2.', '{LawSectionVersion': {'{Content': {'{http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}p': {'{http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}span': {}}}}}}}}}
